system.effect: Prerequisites: 3 of Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception Skills at Expert Rank Daily – Free Action Trigger: Your Pokémon’s attack faints a Wild Pokémon. Effect: You may immediately throw a Poké Ball against the triggering Wild Pokémon, and it may be Captured even though it is knocked out. Calculate Capture Rate as if the target had 1 HP. If the Capture Attempt fails, the Pokémon is knocked out as normal.
